document.full_text: gaston caperton, who as president of the college board is the ultimate proctor of the sat and advanced placement exams, announced friday that he would step down in june 2012.
document.title: education: head of college board to depart next year
lines_and_colors: gaston caperton, who as president of the college board is the ultimate proctor of the sat and advanced placement exams, announced friday that he would step down in june 2012.
